title: Capricorn and Virgo Compatibility: Love, Sex, and More

steps.title: They're super compatible because they share very similar values.
steps.content: They're super compatible because they share very similar values. They are both hardworking, driven, and committed to what they want in life. They also approach relationships in a very similar way, as both signs like to take things slow before trusting a new person. [1] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. A Capricorn and a Virgo will understand each others' need to get to know each other over time. steps.title: Both signs are very matter-of-fact about their emotions.
steps.content: Both signs are very matter-of-fact about their emotions. Virgos and Capricorns prefer to work through their emotions in a calm, rational manner. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. They're both capable of taking the time to listen to each others' perspectives, and their similar values help them see eye to eye often. Capricorn is a cardinal sign , which makes them pretty ambitious. They may prioritize work responsibilities over understanding their emotions. To make a relationship work, they'll have to find a balance between the two. [5] X Research source

steps.title: These signs like to take it slow in the bedroom.
steps.content: These signs like to take it slow in the bedroom. Both signs approach sexuality in a similar way, as they often need to trust their partner before letting go of their inhibitions. If the two take the time to get comfortable with each other, they'll likely start to relax, open up about their desires, and even experiment. [6] X Research source Virgos and Capricorns will both need plenty of encouragement; otherwise, they may feel insecure and inhibited in the bedroom. Earth signs are known for their sensuality, as they're often in tune with their physical needs in the bedroom. This will make the pair particularly compatible, especially once they get comfortable expressing their desires openly. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Capricorns and Virgos communicate effectively with each other.
steps.content: Capricorns and Virgos communicate effectively with each other. They're both pretty analytical signs, and they enjoy talking with each other about their many plans for the future. When things get heated, their mutual need for a stable, healthy relationship helps them avoid angry outbursts. In the end, they'll always be happy to work through things logically so that they can find a reasonable compromise. [8] X Research source Virgos are ruled by Mercury, the planet of communication. This makes them skilled communicators , especially when it comes to conflict . They'll be able to know exactly what to say to help find a solution with a Capricorn. [9] X Research source

steps.title: The pair might need to spice things up sometimes.
steps.content: The pair might need to spice things up sometimes. Capricorn is ruled by Saturn. [10] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. It is the planet of responsibilities and structure. [11] X Research source This compliments Virgo's knack for making plans, but it can also cause the couple to fall into a predictable routine. It's important that these two add some spontaneity to their relationship and find new ways to connect with each other. This pair will benefit from trying new things together as a couple, like taking a class together, going on trips, or picking a new restaurant each date night. Virgo is a mutable sign, which makes them a little more easygoing and open to change in relationships. Their open-minded attitude can encourage the more traditional Capricorn to embrace spontaneity and new horizons. [12] X Research source
